Package client.guiControls

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
client.guiControls.MainController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminMainController, LoginController, UserMainController
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
The main controller acts as the local storage of data, containing the current User and is able to connect to a server connection class. // TODO: Needs redesign & refactor & documentation.
